code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import apiClient from"../api/apiClient";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Offers(){const[offers,setOffers]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const loadOffers=async()=>{try{const res=await apiClient.get("/offers");setOffers(res.data);}catch(err){console.error(err);}finally{setLoading(false);}};useEffect(()=>{loadOffers();},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading offers..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4",children:"Offers"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-white shadow rounded-lg p-4 overflow-x-auto",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"min-w-full text-sm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{className:"bg-gray-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"p-2",children:"ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"p-2",children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"p-2",children:"Payout"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"p-2",children:"Status"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:offers.map(o=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{className:"border-b",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"p-2",children:o.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"p-2 font-medium",children:o.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{className:"p-2",children:["$",o.payout]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"p-2 font-semibold ".concat(o.status==="active"?"text-green-600":"text-red-600"),children:o.status})]},o.id))})]})})]});}
